A chocolate cake is a baked cake that has been used with a chocolate bar or chocolate dust. It is eaten in 3 slices. Each slice of chocolate cake heals 5 Hitpoints, 1 more than a normal slice of cake.

1 chocolate cake is needed for the quest A Tail of Two Cats.

Contents

  • 1 Sources
  • 2 Cooking
  • 3 Item sources
    • 3.1 Shop locations
  • 4 Changes
  • 5 Trivia

Sources[edit | edit source]

  • Making - requires level 50 Cooking. (Note: The easiest way to obtain one is to buy chocolate bars and cake from the Ardougne Baker's Stall. in East Ardougne and combine them.)
  • Reward from Gertrude's Cat.
  • Reward from The Dig Site.
  • Thieving from a bakery stall (only one slice is stolen at a time).
  • Served by a butler when asked to prepared food in your player-owned house (40 Construction required).

Cooking[edit | edit source]

Note: If you already have a cake, just use a chocolate bar on it.

To bake a chocolate cake one needs the following ingredients: an egg, a bucket of milk, a pot of flour, and a chocolate bar.

Mix all ingredients in a cake tin and use the cake tin with a cooking range. Then finally use the chocolate bar on the cake - make sure to right-click, as the left-click option on both items is "eat."

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
26 February 2015
(update)

Partially eaten versions of the item were made untradeable on the Trading Post/Grand Exchange.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Chocolate cakes were formerly a members' only item despite the fact that all of the ingredients were available to free players.

A '''chocolate cake''' is a baked [[cake]] that has been used with a [[chocolate bar]] or [[chocolate dust]]. It is eaten in 3 slices. Each slice of chocolate cake heals 5 [[Hitpoints]], 1 more than a normal slice of cake.

1 chocolate cake is needed for the quest [[A Tail of Two Cats]].

==Sources==
*Making - requires level 50 [[Cooking]]. ('''Note:''' The easiest way to obtain one is to buy [[chocolate bar]]s and [[cake]] from the [[Ardougne Baker's Stall.]] in [[East Ardougne]] and combine them.)
*Reward from [[Gertrude's Cat]].
*Reward from [[The Dig Site]].
*[[Thieving]] from a [[bakery stall]] (only one slice is stolen at a time).
*Served by a [[Servant|butler]] when asked to prepared food in your [[player-owned house]] (40 [[Construction]] required).

==Cooking==
:'''Note:''' If you already have a [[cake]], ''just use a chocolate bar on it.''

To bake a chocolate cake one needs the following ingredients: an [[egg]], a [[bucket of milk]], a [[pot of flour]], and a [[chocolate bar]].

Mix all ingredients in a [[cake tin]] and use the cake tin with a cooking [[range]]. Then finally ''use'' the chocolate bar on the cake - make sure to right-click, as the left-click option on both items is "eat."
